fields.name: Apple
fields.description: Generic term for all apple varieties.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies by specific variety.

fields.name: Braeburn
fields.description: A crisp, tangy apple with a sweet-tart flavor.
fields.visual_characteristics: Red and green skin, firm flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Good for baking, salads, and eating fresh.

fields.name: Crimson Snow
fields.description: A sweet and crisp apple variety with a deep red skin.
fields.visual_characteristics: Deep red skin, firm and juicy flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Ideal for snacking and salads.

fields.name: Fuji
fields.description: A very sweet and crisp apple, great for fresh eating.
fields.culinary_uses: Best for eating fresh, also good in salads.

fields.name: Gala
fields.description: A mild, sweet apple with a crisp texture.
fields.visual_characteristics: Yellow-orange skin with red stripes, crisp flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Good for eating fresh, salads, and sauces.

fields.name: Golden 1
fields.description: A variation of the Golden Delicious apple.
fields.culinary_uses: Great for baking, cooking, and eating fresh.

fields.name: Golden 2
fields.description: Another variation of the Golden Delicious apple.
fields.culinary_uses: Ideal for baking, cooking, and eating fresh.

fields.name: Golden Delicious
fields.description: A classic sweet apple, great for many uses.
fields.visual_characteristics: Golden-yellow skin, firm and juicy flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Perfect for baking, cooking, and fresh eating.

fields.name: Granny Smith
fields.description: A tart, crisp apple, often used in baking.
fields.culinary_uses: Excellent for baking, pies, and salads.

fields.name: Gravensteins Banks
fields.description: A type of Gravenstein apple known for its unique flavor.
fields.visual_characteristics: Varies, typically red or yellow skin with green streaks.
fields.culinary_uses: Good for eating fresh and cooking.

fields.name: Hit
fields.description: A lesser-known apple variety with a unique taste.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies.

fields.name: Honey Crisp
fields.description: A very popular apple known for its crisp texture and sweet-tart flavor.
fields.visual_characteristics: Red and yellow skin, very crisp flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Great for eating fresh, salads, and sauces.

fields.name: McIntosh
fields.description: A classic apple with a soft texture and tart flavor.
fields.visual_characteristics: Red and green skin, softer flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Best for sauces and cider.

fields.name: Pink Lady
fields.description: A crisp, tart apple with a pinkish skin.
fields.culinary_uses: Ideal for eating fresh and baking.

fields.name: Red 1
fields.description: A type of red apple.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies.

fields.name: Red 2
fields.description: Another type of red apple.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies.

fields.name: Red 3
fields.description: Yet another type of red apple.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies.

fields.name: Red Delicious
fields.description: A classic apple known for its deep red color and sweet taste.
fields.culinary_uses: Best for eating fresh.

fields.name: Red Yellow
fields.description: An apple variety with a mix of red and yellow skin.
fields.visual_characteristics: Red and yellow skin, firm flesh.
fields.culinary_uses: Varies.

fields.name: Ruby
fields.description: An apple variety known for its rich red color and sweet taste.
fields.culinary_uses: Good for eating fresh and baking.
